name: Bomb Chicken
description: After a freak accident, a seemingly ordinary chicken becomes a bomb laying free range hero. Explore the versatile mechanic of laying bombs in this explosive exploration platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
